== Subversion Layout ==

  * trunk/
    * plugins/    -- plugin xml files of plugins not yet active in the production network 
    * plugins_dev  
        * plugins 
           * ext     -- example plugins documented in [http://wiki.metaarchive.org metawiki]'s plugins sections 
        * run_one_daemon -- LOCKSS run one daemin setup adapted for metaarchive content
        * scripts  -- scripts that may be useful to plugin developers 
        * testSites  -- web site mockups used in [http://wiki.metaarchive.org metawiki]'s plugins sections 
 
  * branches/ 
      * release/ 
        * cache /     -- scripts for LOCKSS cache administrators 
        * plugins/    -- plugin xml files of plugins active in production network 
        * plugins_dev/
           * manifest_template.html -- a manifest page template 
           * plugintool/  -- LOCKSS plugin tool 
           * plugins/  -- example plugins and templates 
           * run_one_daemon   -- LOCKSS run_one_daemon setup which integrates with MetaArchive's conspectus tool  
           * scripts/  -- miscellaneous scripts that may be used for plugin developers when analyzing a web site 
           * testSites/ -- toy web sites - the project wiki refers to these sites in its plugin documentation  
         * webserver/      -- scripts for web server administrators
